display_long_description:
*For individuals only. If school or business, please visit www.IMMERSE.com website for corporate licensing information.* 

🗣️ Welcome to the most immersive, engaging, and effective way to become fluent in a new language! 

💪 Get 24/7 access to AI-powered training activities, plus live group classes available 7 days per week. 

❤️ IMMERSE is the #1 ranked virtual world on Meta Quest used by over 200,000+ language learners across 93 countries.

🥳 Start your 14-day free trial today! Must be 18 or older.

***

👩‍🏫 LIVE TRAINER-LED CLASSES, AVAILABLE 7 DAYS PER WEEK

Practice key language skills in 40-minute small group lessons led by expert, friendly instructors. Review your personalized feedback and notes after every class. New classes available 7 days per week. 

🗣 24/7 ACCESS TO AI-POWERED PRACTICE

Build your public speaking confidence through vocabulary, pronunciation, and guided roleplay conversation practice powered by our GenAI avatars in our virtual world.

💃🕺🏼 24/7 ACCESS TO LIVE COMMUNITY MEETUPS

Connect with new and old friends in over 40+ virtual locations. Play games, sing karaoke, or casually practice with friends to refine your language skills. 

📈 PERSONALIZED LEARNING PATH

Track your progress across your fluency level in your personalized Learning Path. Review your completed tasks, see how you've grown in unique communication skills, and what activities you have left to progress to the next level.

Start your free 14 day trial today! Cancel anytime. Must be 18 years or older.
